result.title: CodeforcesApiController
result.content:
You may think I don't explore this page, because I recently found the API tool that MikeMirzayanov give us. I read all about this, and really loved it. I started to develop a very simple app to manage easier this api using a graphic interface, if anybody is interested you may download from GitHub Here I have some screenshots, that are no impresive at all, but it could be the begining of something (oh i don't know how to put a picture here, can I??).

All recomendations and help will be very helpful, I hope you like the idea, the objective of this project isn't clear, neither for me, it's just getting fun by now.
